sentence.Network_en: He needs money to electrify his surface lines.
sentence.Network_cn: 他需要钱把他的地面铁路电气化.

sentence.Network_en: Our job is to insPire, suPPort and eleCtrify.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们的工作就是鼓舞、打气 、 支持.

sentence.Network_en: According to connection of word of shoe box electrify , hand mechanism machine.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词汇的奥秘 ... glorify 颂扬，夸赞 electrify 电气化 gasify （使）气化.
英语词根_百度知道 ... carefully 小心地 electrify 通电 electrograph 电传真.
英语单词后缀_百度知道 ... beautify（ 美化）， electrify（ 使充电）， certify（ 肯定），.
考研词根词缀记忆法_百度文库 ... glorify 颂扬； electrify 使电气化 abolish 废除．.

list.abs: 常用物理英文词汇 - 豆丁网 ... electrification by friction 摩擦起电 electrified body 带电体 electrode 电极.
fully clockwise 顺时针满旋fully electrified 全盘电气化的fully enclosed motor 全封闭式电动机
带字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 带答不理〖 attendtosb.halfheartedly〗 带电〖 electrified〗 带钢〖 stripsteel〗.
electrification电气化electrified railway电气铁道electro discharge alloying电火花合金化
电瓶机车 battery locomotive电气化铁道 electrified railway电气化铁路 electrified railroad

entry.tran: 使极为兴奋;使激动不已;使震惊
entry.def: If people are electrified by an event or experience, it makes them feel very excited and surprised.

example.ex: The world was electrified by his courage and resistance.
example.tran: 世人为他的勇气和反抗精神震惊不已。

entry.def: When a railway system or railway line is electrified, electric cables are put over the tracks, or electric rails are put beside them, so that the trains can be powered by electricity.

example.ex: The west-coast line was electrified as long ago as 1974.
example.tran: 西海岸铁路线早在1974年就实现了电气化。

example.ex: ...the electrified section of the Lancashire and Yorkshire Railway.
example.tran: 兰开夏郡至约克郡铁路的电气化路段

auth_sentence.content: What is needed to turn a million people's grumbling discontent into a crowd on the streets is a spark to electrify them.
auth_sentence.res_content: What is needed to turn a million people's grumbling discontent into a crowd on the streets is a spark to electrify them.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What is needed to turn a million people's grumbling discontent into a crowd on the streets is a spark to electrify them.

auth_sentence.content: If we do not make the effort to electrify transportation, we have few choices.
auth_sentence.res_content: If we do not make the effort to electrify transportation, we have few choices.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If we do not make the effort to electrify transportation, we have few choices.

auth_sentence.content: Kapolon said the project at Mbuiru doesn't directly electrify individual houses, but rather provides power to a business centre.
auth_sentence.res_content: Kapolon said the project at Mbuiru doesn't directly electrify individual houses, but rather provides power to a business centre.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Kapolon said the project at Mbuiru doesn't directly electrify individual houses, but rather provides power to a business centre.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表示"电" 注:electr的原义是琥珀,现指由于磨擦琥珀而产生的电

stems_affixes.value_cn: 电的, 导电的, 电动的
stems_affixes.word_buile: electr电+ic……的→adj.电的, 导电的, 电动的
electric电的, 导电的+al..的→adj.电的, 有关电的
electr电+on物理上一些名词→n.电子

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使充电,使通电;使电气化
stems_affixes.word_buile: electr电+ify……化→v.使充电,使通电;使电气化

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使都市化;使人有城市派头
stems_affixes.word_buile: city城市+ify使……化,成为……→citify使都市化
electr电+ify使……化,成为……→v.使充电,使通电 v.电气化
fruit果实+ify使……化,成为……→v.结果实,成功

stems_affixes.value_cn: 加强; 变强; 加剧
stems_affixes.word_buile: intense强烈的+ify……化→v.加强; 变强; 加剧
ugly丑陋的,难看的+ify使……化,成为……→v.弄成难看,丑化

sentences.en: The national railway system has nearly all been electrified.
sentences.cn: 全国的铁路系统几乎全部实现了电气化。
精彩的表演令观众兴奋不已。
